name: Ticketsolve Shows
author: Roger Herbert

sections.description: Ticketsolve is an online box office system for selling event tickets. This plugin parses the public XML feed from any account on that system and produces a simple list of upcoming shows that you can display in your Worpdress blog.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the upcoming-ticketsolve-shows folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the widget to your templates
sections.faq:
Is this plugin made by Ticketsolve?

No, Ticketsolve are not responsible for the plugin. I am not affiliated with them, aside from using their excellent service on some client projects. This plugin was born from the need to integrate some box office links with a WordPress blog.

What about foo bar?

Foo bar is a terrible affliction that many suffer from in silence. Please consult your local physician.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial version.

1.1a

  • Uses querystring tag & category filtering when pulling XML data from Ticketsolve

short_description: Loads future shows from your Ticketsolve box office server.
